name: Addiction
description: You crave a substance or activity and suffer penalties when deprived.

name: Dark Secret
description: A terrible secret from your past could ruin you if revealed.

name: Dependence
description: You require regular exposure to a substance or condition to function normally.

name: Dependent
description: Someone relies on you for protection and support.

name: Diminished Vitality
description: Reduced stamina leaves you vulnerable to fatigue and injury.

name: Enemy
description: A specific foe actively works against you.

name: Taboo
description: Breaking a personal or cultural taboo has dire consequences for you.
